Text:
This torrent has a disk image, but the compressed DVD files are not saved/expanded under the correct folder to let a DVD player use the files (They are just in the root folder).  You need to uncompress the files and when you write the disk, make sure you use the DVD video format and make sure the files you get are written into the folder VIDEO_TS - if you are doing it correctly, there will be an AUDIO_TS folder there as well, it will be empty - that's ok.

Hope this helps.
